Reviews.Title: Overall, a good phone for its price.
Reviews.Author: Deborah Y.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone about 2 weeks ago. For 2 weeks, I have been using the phone and observed it really closely to find its pros and cons.Pros: Price. For a price of under $60.00, it is almost impossible to find other 4G LTE phones made by major companies. Price is the biggest winner in this phone.Ok reliability -- Like other reviews, it is true that it freezes and may lose calls. But it does not happen all the time, they happen occasionlly.Reception is tolerable. At first, I thought the reception was horrible. But after removing the vinyl safety film that had covered the speaker, it became OK.Cons:Tends to freeze a lot, especially when you are doing something that requires a lot of memory. Definitely not a phone for heavy game players or data users.Blackout possible. When it freezes, it is also possible for the phone to black out.Touchscreen reaction is not the best of all. Many times you have to push the icon twice or three times until you get the reaction.Battery runs out rather fast. I am not a heavy phone user at all. I rarely talk on the phone, I never play games, just occasionally use internet browser, navigation app, and Amazon kindle app for reading books. With a minimal use, the battery does not last a whole day. It is a good idea to purchase an extra battery and carry it around, with chargers so that you can frequently charge it.Must get the SD card along with the purchase of phone itself. It has very little, almost non-existent internal memory, and without a SD card, you cannot even save contacts.Overall, an OK phone. Not so horrible, but when you think about the price and 4G LTE on the top of it, I would definitely recommend this phone to the people who are on the budget, not a heavy phone user, and first time smartphone users. People who have had smartphone previously from other major companies would not find the phone satisfactory, but for the starters and savers, this phone would be recommendable.

Reviews.Title: A good 4G LTE phone
Reviews.Author: Sean Kim
Reviews.Content: My wife purchased this phone for her first smartphone. Of course, compared to my galaxy phone, it has many shortcomings. But it meets the need of my wife's everyday use, and she is very satisfied with this phone. I would recommend this phone to first smartphone users or casual phone users.

Reviews.Title: Pantech breakout 4GLTE verizon android smartphone review
Reviews.Author: Beverly Lewis
Reviews.Content: Phone's receiver is not strong keeps cutting out during conversations. Switches to 3G more often than 4G. The memory is very limited and camnot accommodate much more than the aps that it was delivered with. The battery runs out very quickly even when idle. The samsung stratosphere II managed more apps efficiently.

Reviews.Title: It works with out any problems. No freezing or anything like everyone saying.
Reviews.Author: linda hornickel
Reviews.Content: Works great for me. Even the camera is pretty good. Has not flash but in sun light takes very good pictures.

Reviews.Title: Good little phone
Reviews.Author: rblibrarian
Reviews.Content: I like it. It's thin and doesn't weigh too much and it takes pretty good pictures. However, the best feature is the Swype setting on the keyboard. You just drag your finger around and it forms the word for you. No more punching multiple letters and cussing when your finger hits the wrong one. Brilliant!

Reviews.Title: It's ok.
Reviews.Author: Caleb
Reviews.Content: This phone is a good starter smartphone. I wouldn't recommend it if you're looking for a phone that will work for a long period of time. It gets unbearably slow to pull up anything and has very little internal memory. It will begin to break down after a period of a few months so I would get this as a simple replacement if needed. Otherwise if you have the ability to select another phone I would take that chance.

Reviews.Title: Solid phone in good condition
Reviews.Author: Peter Allen
Reviews.Content: Phone was exactly what I had expected/hoped.  I've been using it for a couple of weeks now and no problems yet.  The battery life is quite decent for a smartphone, and the case and screen are scratch-free.

Reviews.Title: Very limited phone - not worth it.
Reviews.Author: R.K. Owen, Ph.D.
Reviews.Content: It’s amazing how this phone is so poorly designed.  I got this phone because of a warranty replacement for my HTC Incredible.  Here I list the defects that make this phone almost useless:The headphone jack is not sealed, so dust collects on the inside screen and over the front-facing camera, making any such images look obscured and “old-timey.”  I would also prefer the jack to be on the top instead of the left side.I’ve added an 8 GB microSD, but the phone can’t use it for system apps.  It’s fine for any added apps though.  There is only 376 MB of internal space and upgrading a system app eats into this and is quickly exhausted.  So you generally have to uninstall any upgrades and use the original version in ROM.The GPS just doesn’t seem to work well at all and is useless for geocaching (maybe 200 ft accuracy).Because of the phone jack location, when propping the phone on exercise equipment to watch Netflix, the button on the bottom side gets pressed breaking the Netflix stream to start the music or recorded audio playlist.Battery charging is hit-or-miss also.  It will often say “Charging temporarily stopped.  Battery temperature is too low” or just not charge.The phone doesn’t have a flash for the camera.

Reviews.Title: Pantech Breakout 4G LTE Verizon Android Smart Phone
Reviews.Author: L María
Reviews.Content: Pantech Breakout 4G LTE Verizon Android Smart Phone is for my daughter. She is so excited. It's not too small or too big. I cannot wait to see her face!

Reviews.Title: No good
Reviews.Author: Tori
Reviews.Content: The first day I had this phone it worked great. It is very basic with not a lot of storage space but a good starter phone. It started to freeze more and more each day which wasn't a big deal you just have to remove the battery. Then, it stayed frozen after taking the battery out for hours at a time. I sent it back unfortunately since it wouldn't unfreeze.

Reviews.Title: great first phone for tween
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Got this phone for my son that is 11. Perfect for him. I was happy with the cost and it being his first phone works great. He can take pics, surf the web, download games.

Reviews.Title: this phone sucked!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We sent this phone back.... I downloaded a couple of games and it said there wasn't anymore room for anything else..I just couldn't use it... got a droid instead.... its great!

Reviews.Title: Wireless Liquidators is a rip off company and sent me a stolen phone
Reviews.Author: Robert Klotz
Reviews.Content: They sent me a stolen phone that I found out when I went to activate it. Then when I reported, they reported back that this was impossible as if I was lying about this. I was greatly inconvenience taking me an extra week before I had a working phone and the hassle of returning this phone and getting my money back. I did get my money back.

Reviews.Title: shipped early
Reviews.Author: jessgoupil8
Reviews.Content: But it turns off and on by it self sometimes and you can't look things up on the internet really good but its a good backup phone

Reviews.Title: Thank You Amazon!
Reviews.Author: Alicia
Reviews.Content: Phone is working great it transferred to my existing line with no problem ! At a reasonable price and I didn't have to extend my contract just because I needed a new phone

Reviews.Title: Limited Memory, Freezes A Lot
Reviews.Author: J. Rosenfeld
Reviews.Content: Awful phone...has barely 500mb memory.  Whenever you download a new app, you have to get rid of an old app.  If you use an app that take some memory, like Google Play or Tune-In, the phone tends to freeze.  Not worth it.

Reviews.Title: Its nice
Reviews.Author: joe
Reviews.Content: I would rate this a 5 as my wife loves it. but the shipping was slow and thus gave t a 4.  Was suppose to receive by the 11th and did not ntil the 13th,  Guess a lucky  fridy the 13th this yea, All in all it is a good phone

Reviews.Title: Birthday present
Reviews.Author: Crow
Reviews.Content: My son loves his phone and thinks that it is AWESOME.....Bought it for his birthday and he hasn't complained about it at all.

Reviews.Title: piece of crap
Reviews.Author: WorkerBee
Reviews.Content: returned it because the battery would not hold a charge and it wouldn't activate even when plugged in. bad luck.

5 MEGAPIXEL CAMERA
ANDROID
BLUETOOTH
MOBILE HOTSPOT
ProductInfo.Name: Pantech Breakout 4G LTE Verizon Android Smart Phone
